examples.example: 我给好朋友打了一通电话，分享了最近的快乐点滴。

translate.english: I made a phone call to a good friend and shared the recent bits of happiness.

examples.example: 我给远方的父母打了一通电话，送去了我的问候和思念。

translate.english: I made a phone call to my parents in the distance and sent my regards and misses.

examples.example: 我给老师打了一通电话，表达了我对他的感激之情。

translate.english: I made a phone call to the teacher and expressed my gratitude to him.
